body: Whenever you fall, you don't take any damage and you land on your feet. When using this ability, you fall at a rate of 150 feet per round, and can move up to 5 feet horizontally for every 10 feet you fall.
name: Nimble Glide
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Trickster/1st-Tier Trickster Path Abilities/Nimble Glide
